title: Single Of The Week: Dam Mantle – Not A Word
body:
[![](http://admin.crackintheroad.com/wp-content/uploads/2011/06/dammantle.jpg "dammantle")](http://admin.crackintheroad.com/music/8666-single-of-the-week-dam-mantle-not-a-word/attachment/dammantle/)

Repetition is a delicate art, the ability to create something that remains interesting, despite plugging the shit of it. [**Dam Mantle**](http://www.facebook.com/dammantle)’s new single, ‘Not a word’, gets it just right. It contains a hook that holds with its painful sentiment, but yet still holds a wondrous infidelity that’s hard to lay a finger on. The production remains graceful, while the vocals that hold the song together are fleeting and heartbreakingly stuttering.

Watch the official video below and enjoy the next 7 days of your life. JC x
